title: ListOfUILayout
description: Represents a config file that houses different layouts for the Tracker UI

UILayout.description: Class that represents a layout of the tracker UI

GridLocations.description: A collection of all objects to be shown in the tracker UI

UIGridLocation.description: Represents a single spot in the Tracker UI

Type.description: The type of object this location represents

Row.description: The row in the UI where this spot is located

Column.description: The column in the UI where this spot is located

Image.description: Image to display in this location

Identifiers.description: Collection of object identifiers to look up for this location

UIGridLocationType.description: Enum for different types of grid spots in the tracker UI
